thawa deyak thama, me surya kosha wala mila adu wimath samaga, balashakthiya niwasata sapayana samagam, me surya kosha nipadawana athiriktha widuliya, enam pawichchi nokarana tika aapasu miladi ganna milath, owun widuliya apata wikunana milata wada godak adu kara thiyanawa.
